revised_title: The Formation and Growth of a New Island in the Bay of Santorini
tldr: Father Goree, a Jesuit, witnessed the formation of a new island in the Bay of Santorini in 1707. The island rose from the sea due to subterranean fires and earthquakes. It grew in height, length, and breadth over time, and its movement was visible and sometimes uneven. The surrounding sea also changed color and smelled bad, indicating the ongoing volcanic activity. This new island, along with other volcanic islands in the area, provide valuable insights into the geological processes of the region.
